function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19","Impact":"High infection rates, economic stagnation, limitations on activities","Mitigation":"Preventive measures such as social distancing, quarantine, and hand washing","Technologies":"Vaccines, treatments, improved air quality systems","People":"General population, global economy","Owner":"Health organizations, governments, global community"},{"Description":"Poor air quality","Impact":"4.6 million deaths per year from diseases caused by poor air quality","Mitigation":"Improved air quality systems, reduction of air pollution","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, pollution control systems","People":"General population, particularly those in areas with poor air quality","Owner":"Environmental agencies, governments, pollution control authorities"}]}
